trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that controls authentication parameters for the HTTP transport.
trans-unit.target: 表示控制 HTTP 傳輸之驗證參數的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.HttpTransportSecurityElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.HttpTransportSecurityElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of client credential to be used for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用於驗證之用戶端認證的類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of client credential to be used for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 要用於驗證之用戶端認證的型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" /> instance which contains the configuration settings to use for extended protection for a session.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" /> 執行個體，其中包含用於工作階段延伸保護的組態設定。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" /> instance which contains the configuration settings to use for extended protection for a session.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" /> 執行個體，包含用於工作階段延伸保護的組態設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of client credential to be used for authentication against the proxy.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用於驗證 Proxy 的用戶端認證類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of client credential to be used for authentication against the proxy.
trans-unit.target: 要用於驗證 Proxy 之用戶端認證的型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the authentication realm for digest or basic authentication.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定摘要式或基本驗證的驗證領域。

trans-unit.source: An authentication realm is a string that contains at least the name of the host performing the authentication.
trans-unit.target: 驗證領域是一個字串，其中至少包含負責執行驗證之主機的名稱。

trans-unit.source: It can also specify a collection of users that has access.
trans-unit.target: 也可以指定具有存取權之使用者的集合。

trans-unit.source: A user can query the authentication realm to understand which one of the several possible usernames and passwords can be used.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以查詢驗證領域，以瞭解可以使用的其中一組使用者名稱和密碼。
